description:
Gao must protect his new Buddy monster from Kyoya Gaen, who claims this newly-discovered monster could be a threat. Kyoya challenges Gao to a Buddyfight, giving him less than a day to unlock the secrets of the Sun Dragons and the new Impact Monsters.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Uh-oh! An Impact Monster Is Born!
ヤベェ! 必殺モンスター誕生!!
